Author: Somz1
Title: [ANN] BitPlus Network BPNT- Next Generation Merchant Ecosystem
Body: While magjor Crypto Currencies are still getting in grips to implement visa MasterCard etc, how do you plan on doing that being a new Crypto

Author: BitPlusNetwork
Title: [ANN] BitPlus Network BPNT- Next Generation Merchant Ecosystem
Body: We’ve already done it! Our merchants are currently processing Visa/MasterCard transactions on our network, as well as accepting Crypto.

Author: BitPlusNetwork
Title: [ANN] BitPlus Network BPNT- Next Generation Merchant Ecosystem
Body: Thanks! We are more than just a payment channel, we can help you keep track of your inventory and even do inventory forecasting. Our platforms are fully customizable to ensure that merchants have access to features that other solutions simply do not have.

Author: DU3O
Title: [ANN] BitPlus Network BPNT- Next Generation Merchant Ecosystem
Body: BitPlus Network team has been doing a great job since 2014. Now they already have lots of merchants using their solution, and there will be more coming in the future, once they launch the iOS & Android Acadia POS app on January 2018.  I could say that BPNT project is already successful. It will just become bigger and bigger, which is very possible because of their huge target market, the credit card holders (visa/mastercard).  So this chance is very rare to participate on their ico and airdrop. No doubt that this will be very worth it.

Author: BitPlusNetwork
Title: [ANN] BitPlus Network BPNT- Next Generation Merchant Ecosystem
Body: logo BitPlus Network BPNT   | Website | Whitepaper| Telegram | Twitter| Facebook| Token Buying Instructions | Slack|     What is the BitPlus Network?  The BitPlus Network is an ecosystem of business applications that rewards it’s users for engaging in provable VISA/MasterCard transactions via a native token, BPNT.  Why should you buy BPNT?  Our two live platforms, Interactify and Acadia POS ALREADY HAVE MERCHANTS USING THEM IN THEIR STORES! This is huge, as the majority of projects are ideas that have yet to be realized.  When you purchase BPNT during the presale/Token Generating Event, you are buying services at a discounted rate. After the Token Generating Event, new BPNT can only be generated through provable transactions on the platform. Merchant token holders can use BPNT to pay for the BitPlus Network services and hardware. All token holders can use their tokens to pay for products from participating merchants. In addition, BPNT will be available on an internal exchange.  Merchants will also have access to blockchain based, secured and unsecured business growth capital on our soon-to-be released Funding module.   Quick Facts Name: BPNT Ticker: BPNT Type: ERC20 Token Total Supply: 30,000,000 BPNT bitplus.network BPNT can ALREADY be redeemed for products and services!    25% discount ends in 1 DAY 17 HOURS!   Airdrop Participation   Click here for Airdrop Details   DO NOT POST ETH ADDRESSES IN THE COMMENTS! PLEASE FILL OUT THIS FORM. WE DO NOT ACCEPT THIS FORM OF COMMUNICATION! THANK YOU!   Tokens will be released within 30 days of Token Generating end date. Stay tuned for more participation options!   bitplus.network| Token Buying Instructions |

Author: bgsnan
Title: [ANN] BitPlus Network BPNT- Next Generation Merchant Ecosystem
Body: The BitPlus platform by nature encourages cryptocurrency adoption across all sectors through a rewards system distributing network-specific tokens to BitPlus Network service users, and making tokens a valid form of payment at any retailer in the BitPlus Network. The number of tokens that a user is able to redeem at a time on any given service and the value assigned to the tokens for the purchases of such services will be based on a mixture of market price and operable sustainability. These features decides the token price stable.
